senses.synonym: 10345215-n (someone who shows impressive and stylish excellence)

relations.target: conscientious=00310936-a (characterized by extreme care and great effort; \""conscientious application to the work at hand\""; \""painstaking research\""; \""scrupulous attention to details\"");02093261-a (guided by or in accordance with conscience or sense of right and wrong; \""a conscientious decision to speak out about injustice\""
demeanor=04904939-n ((behavioral attributes) the way a person behaves toward other people)

refined=01145585-a (suggesting taste, ease, and wealth);01845051-a (precise to a fine degree; \""due to the limitations of the available tools, a more refined analysis of the data may be necessary\"");01953883-a ((used of persons and their behavior) cultivated and genteel; \""she was delicate and refined and unused to hardship\""; \""refined people with refined taste\"");01960119-a (freed from impurities by processing; \""refined sugar\""; \""refined oil\""; \""to gild refined gold\""- Shakespeare);02278936-a (showing a high degree of refinement and the assurance that comes from wide social experience; \""his polished manner\""; \""maintained an urbane tone in his letters\""

senses.definition: An entity exhibiting high class especially through refinement of demeanor, conscientiousness of behavior, and/or skillfulness in performance; or an exhibition of high class especially of one or more of those types
